verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> Yah! <S%H3050><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3050><s%> my soul. <S%H5315><s%>
While I live, <S%H2416><s%> I will praise <S%H1984><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> I will sing praises <S%H2167><s%> to my God as long as I exist. <S%H430><s%>
Don't <S%H982><s%> put your trust in princes, <S%H5081><s%> each a son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> in whom there is no help. <S%H8668><s%>
His spirit <S%H7307><s%> departs, <S%H3318><s%> and he returns <S%H7725><s%> to the earth. <S%H127><s%> In that very day, <S%H3117><s%> his thoughts <S%H6250><s%> perish. <S%H6><s%>
Happy <S%H835><s%> is he who has the God <S%H410><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> for his help, <S%H5828><s%> whose hope <S%H7664><s%> is in Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> his God: <S%H430><s%>
who made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth, <S%H776><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and all that is in them; <S%H8104><s%> who keeps truth <S%H571><s%> forever; <S%H5769><s%>

who executes <S%H6213><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%> for the oppressed; <S%H6231><s%> who gives <S%H5414><s%> food <S%H3899><s%> to the hungry. <S%H7457><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> frees <S%H5425><s%> the prisoners. <S%H631><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> opens <S%H6491><s%> the eyes of the blind. <S%H5787><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> raises <S%H2210><s%> up those who are bowed down. <S%H3721><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> loves <S%H157><s%> the righteous. <S%H6662><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> preserves <S%H8104><s%> the foreigners. <S%H1616><s%> He upholds <S%H5749><s%> the fatherless <S%H3490><s%> and widow, <S%H490><s%> but the way <S%H1870><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> he turns upside down. <S%H5791><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will reign <S%H4427><s%> forever; <S%H5769><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> O Zion, <S%H6726><s%> to all <S%H1755><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> Yah! <S%H3050><s%>
